Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its exceptional quality and features, it's worth more than $150 to us. Considering its value and what it can offer you, I propose a price of $120 for this product. This is a special offer tailored to discerning buyers like yourself. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at an attractive price. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
